description: This table stores audit trail data about wound therapy treatments that have been applied to a wound.

columns.name: IP_LDA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the wound.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: THERAPY_IP_LDA_ID
columns.description: The previously documented wound therapy device that treated this wound.

columns.name: TREATMENT_START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The previously documented treatment start instant

columns.name: TREATMENT_END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The previously documented treatment end instant

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The user who previously documented this data

columns.name: ENTRY_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant this data was previously documented at

columns.name: EDITED_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the value documented before this line was entered, if this was not the first entry. Corresponds to the value of LINE for another row in WOUND_THERAPY_TREAT_AUDIT.
